Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6104 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.3-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6104 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.3-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.7.3-5, affected by CVE-2024-6104
